meta.name: Agent Zoo UI Design Vibes
meta.intent: Design guidance + tokens for a clean, modern, calm, collaboration-focused web UI. Inspired by an airy SaaS dashboard/chat vibe: lots of whitespace, soft neutrals, subtle elevation, rounded shapes, and gentle accent colors. Do not replicate any specific product UI; only follow the overall feel.

principles: Airy, calm, and readable: prioritize whitespace, clear hierarchy, and generous line-height.
Softly structured: use subtle borders/elevation instead of heavy dividers; keep contrast sufficient.
Friendly precision: rounded corners, pill controls, and gentle motion; avoid loud gradients or harsh shadows.
Three-column clarity when useful: navigation left, primary content center, supportive info right.
Fast scanning: consistent spacing, predictable component patterns, and restrained color usage.

responsiveBehavior: At < md: collapse right panel into a slide-over drawer.
At < sm: collapse left nav into a hamburger drawer; keep top bar with search/actions.
Keep primary content as the focus; secondary panels should never crowd the main content.

surfaces.elevationStrategy: Use borders + very soft shadows. Avoid heavy drop shadows and strong outlines.

usageGuidelines: Keep the UI mostly neutral. Use accents sparingly for active states, primary actions, and small highlights.
Prefer soft-tinted backgrounds (accent.*.50) over saturated fills for large areas.
Always maintain readable contrast: body text should meet WCAG AA.

guidelines: Use elevation 1 for cards and small popovers, 2 for panels/modals, 3 for high-priority overlays.
Prefer borders for structure; shadows should feel barely-there.

iconography.style: simple line icons with rounded joins

guidelines: Animations should be subtle and functional (state changes, drawer transitions).
Avoid bouncy motion; keep it calm and professional.
Respect reduced motion preferences: disable non-essential transitions.

buttons.shape: rounded (md) or pill for primary CTA
variants: secondary: subtle neutral fill with border
danger: red for destructive actions only
states: hover: slightly darker fill or neutral hover wash
disabled: reduce opacity and remove shadow

guidelines: Prefer embedded leading icons for search and filter fields.
Use helper text and validation messages below the field, not inside.

cards.header: title + optional subtle actions on right

leftNav.activeState: soft tinted background + medium weight label
leftNav.sectioning: group related items with small section headers

topBar.visual: thin bottom border; no heavy shadow

lists.dividers: use subtle borders or spacing, not heavy lines

chat.bubbleShape: rounded lg with slightly larger radius than cards
chat.incomingStyle: neutral tinted surface with subtle border
chat.outgoingStyle: soft accent tint (accent.secondary.50) or neutral with stronger emphasis

composer.position: sticky at bottom of content pane
composer.actions: attach/plus on left, send CTA on right

rightPanel.visual: same card/panel style as main; keep density slightly higher than main content

microcopyGuidelines: Use short labels (1â€“2 words) and clear verbs (Send, Save, Pause).
Prefer sentence case. Avoid shouting (ALL CAPS) except for tiny tags.
Provide empty states that guide the next action in one sentence.

keyboard: All interactive elements reachable via Tab.
Visible focus state on all components.
Escape closes dialogs/drawers; Enter activates primary action where appropriate.

doNotDo: Do not use heavy drop shadows, neon accents, or high-saturation full-bleed gradients.
Do not overuse dividers; prefer spacing and subtle borders.
Do not cram multiple dense toolbars into the primary content area.
Do not rely on color alone to convey status (also use icons/text).
